classified_components.reasoning: Piston rod is a critical component in the reciprocating engine of ICE vehicles and does not have an equivalent function in electric vehicles.
Shock Piston is a fundamental component of suspension systems and remains essential in both Internal Combustion Engine (ICE) and Electric Vehicle (EV) vehicles.
Damper tubes are used in both ICE and EV vehicles for suspension system functionality, which remains unchanged during the transition.
Mounting brackets are used to secure various vehicle components, many of which remain in both ICE and EV vehicles.
